metadata.title: CVE-2024-0775 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the __ext4_remount in fs/ext4/super.c inext4 in the Linux kernel. This flaw allows a local user to cause aninformation leak problem while freeing the old quota file names before apotential failure, leading to a use-after-free.

criterions.comment: linux package in focal is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.4.0-162.179').
linux-hwe-5.8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-5.11').
